```{r 01010201setup, include=FALSE}
## 01010201 ->- Median of a set of integer values.
```


```{r echo=FALSE, results='hide'}
## DATA GENERATION
signifDig <- 4

n = sample(15:20, 1)

data = c(sample(1:10, n, replace=TRUE))

## QUESTION/ANSWER GENERATION
sol = median(data)

sol = signif(sol, signifDig)
```


```{r eval=(language == "en"), echo=FALSE, results='hide'}
question=paste0("Given this set of integer values $$", paste0(data, collapse = ", "),"$$ find their **median**.")

answer=paste0("The answer is ",
  sol
)

```


```{r eval=(language == "es"), echo=FALSE, results='hide'}

```
